inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: severe migratory pain in the right lower quadrant of his abdomen that started four days ago, nausea and vomiting

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: CT scan showed evidence of acute perforated appendicitis with free fluid in the pelvis

exclusion.criterion: treatment with infliximab or other TNF-α affecting drugs
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient is a candidate for emergent laparoscopic appendectomy under general anesthesia.
